mainTask: Write an article on benefits of meditation

subtasks.subtaskName: Research the benefits of meditation (stress reduction, improved focus, emotional regulation, etc.)
Find supporting evidence and credible sources (studies, expert opinions, etc.)
Create an outline for the article (introduction, body paragraphs, conclusion)
Write the introduction (hook, background information, thesis statement)
Write body paragraphs (each focusing on a specific benefit, with supporting evidence)
Write the conclusion (summarize main points, restate thesis, call to action)
Edit and proofread the article for grammar, spelling, and clarity
Format the article for publication (headings, subheadings, citations)
